documents.document: @Spinprofessor thanks Claire! Will do! 🙂
And so ends an epic three year chapter. Thanks for everything @cocamassey, you've been good to me. Zàijiàn.✌🏽😌
Bittersweet times :: finishing up three years at CoCA next week and then off to China to teach design for a semester 👋🏽🇨🇳✈️ how bout dah.
@thomaslebas wait, I still don't get where you were going with that though...
@karlwkane @Raph_Roake second that. @coca222494 image and identity in my opinion a good option straight off the bat :)
Shanghai bound to perform with @WOWAwardsShow ! Super excited and grateful for this, brb social media 🇨🇳👋🏽✈️✨ #firewallproblems
Finally got the chance to take a proper look around #EXP16 ~ inspiring work #coca4, very proud 🙌 https://t.co/Io3AWllOM6
@thomaslebas I may revert to that soon I'm getting hungry ⏰
Great day for an #MDes cleanse 🔥🔥🔥 https://t.co/PsX0DR8NVC
Awesome to be a part of the Creative Native panel at Kava Club tonight ~ so proud of our Māori & Pasifika graduates. https://t.co/I7oucIyg2t
Great article on our education system's racial divide giving me motivation this Monday morning 🔥✊🏽 https://t.co/P96CEFg3mi
@jo_bailey so kind thanks Jo 😌🙏🏽
Good luck to #coca4 for your presentations this week! You've worked so hard for this ~ be proud and enjoy it.
Some amazing #coca3 #coca358 presentations this morning! Feeling proud. Get some well deserved sleep and have a great summer!
Ya had to get in quick ~ Big thanks to @littlepenangnz for helping out tonight, always so generous! 🙌🏽 https://t.co/idccWJrXgz
@jesssarahread you're so welcome! The homestretch struggle is still fresh in my mind, hope it helped (food helps everything) 😁🍴
Dear students of Block 12, a little sustenance koha will be arriving on level E at around 8.15pm. #coca1 #coca2 #coca3 #coca4
Survival tips for week 12 :: Naps and vitamins. Go well #coca1 #coca2 #coca3 #coca4 —you can do it 👊🏽👊🏽👊🏽
Huge highlight bringing this garment to life for the Weta workshop section ~ thanks WoW 😌💁🏾✨ https://t.co/8alP9cYzGB
Thank you! Needed! :) https://t.co/qgu41s5O9X

@melaniejaane thanks Melanie :) hope you enjoyed the show ✨
@thomaslebas bruh. this whole experience though...
@Spinprofessor thanksssss! and thanks for coming! ☺️
@CRMacEwan thank you! needed ✨✨✨
#MDes survival package from @WOWAwardsShow 😭😭😭 first week of shows done and four days til hand in... https://t.co/pva1s3COgB
@naaanz thanks Nanz! At the moment my goal is just to still be breathing at the end ha. Hope you're good!
MDes exam in three weeks, MDes exegesis due in two weeks, WoW show opening in one week. What a time to be alive.
2nd judging done and less than 3 weeks til showtime! 💪🏽💃🏽✨🎪Tickets still available - this year's show is epic. https://t.co/gWTIk8RMh5
@karlwkane 10 mins knocked out + caffeine⚡️💊👌🏽😏
Some great presentations today #coca3 👊🏽 looking forward to part 2 - good luck choosing a brief! https://t.co/9NIqYjQNsV
@Raph_Roake you're welcome! hope your presentation went well :) 👊🏽🍬
A snippet of some #mdes stuff 💃🏽👀 Full video at https://t.co/GtTR394QFt https://t.co/NjEWyVVpPX

@jason_ohara yes, yes they are, and yes it is.

@jason_ohara wasssssssuuuppppp! you may witness the worst of me, you've been warned.
Welcome back everyone, may this be your best semester yet 👊🏽💯:: @cocamassey

@coca222453 @Base_Design this is great, though the use of 'design' in #2 :: it implies ideas and concepts are not part of a design process?
@samrye_enspiral nice huh? It's called "Art Without Compromise" by Wendy Richmond—all about creative practice. so far so good!
The process. https://t.co/EQ7Z7HbfhA
@annabelrw That was a memorable class for me too! #iloveideassssss
@hollie_arnett That's great! You're welcome - I've just uploaded the exercises to Stream forum if you want that for reference also :) 💪🏽🖍
@johannesbay you're very welcome :) looking forward to seeing your ideas evolve and take shape 🌶🌶🌶
Thanks to everyone who invested in the creative processes workshop today! We appreciated your energy, hope it's useful going forward #coca4
"I can't understand why people are frightened of new ideas. I'm frightened of the old ones." - John Cage. #creativeprocessesworkshop #coca4
Best seat in the house for Street Dance NZ National Finals tonight! Lessss go. #mdes 😎💃🏽 https://t.co/7ULuSbbOVa
#coca494 'Beyond the hashtag' social media examples all on Stream.

Defining the scope requires understanding what it isn't. Push and pull. #coca4
@jesssarahread I am! 2-3pm on Level E north end, see you then.
@coca222453 @annabelrw It's currently, "How can rhetoric and persuasion..." ...tbc. watch this space...
@annabelrw the beauty and pain of it! You'll likely go through much much more as you go :)
@annabelrw Just similar in word choice issue!.. Aka what do you mean by 'design'? A process, an end point etc.. Think 'slice of the pie'.
